title: T206 Home Run Baker raw beater
author: classicjay17

posts.post_title: T206 Home Run Baker raw beater
posts.post_content:
Found this in my laptop case the other day, had sold it on Ebay a couple years ago but buyer never paid.

Not for the condition sensitive collector, but a nice beater.  $Sold paypal delivered.
